briefTitle: An Observational Study of the Mean Duration of Trastuzumab (Herceptin) Treatment in Participants With Early or Metastatic Human Epidermal Growth Factor Receptor 2 (HER2)-Positive Breast Cancer
officialTitle: Multicenter, Single-Arm, Observational Study of Mean Duration of Trastuzumab (Herceptin) Treatment in Patients With HER2-Positive Early or Metastatic Breast Cancer in Romanian Population
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Treatment Duration With Trastuzumab in the Routine Clinical Practice
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* HER2-positive breast cancer
* Treated with trastuzumab in accordance with Summary of Product Characteristics and local protocols
* Written informed consent to data collection

Exclusion Criteria:

* Any contraindication to trastuzumab
* Clinically relevant cardiovascular disorder or disease
